supportIntro: After sentence 411-2017 of the Supreme Court of Justice of El Salvador, the State had to legislate in favor of the victims of a forced displacement caused by violence and acknowledge this fact. Three years later, a law was approved but it does not have any regulations. Even if there are international agreements, such as the Convention of refugees of 1951 and the Cartagena and the Brazil Declaration, in El Salvador these are dead documents. What do families have to face when they look for the support of the State?
